summary: Two bounty hunters (Albert Dupontel and Bouli Lanners) are looking for a cell phone in the french countryside. They meet cowboys, fools and Jesus.
cast: Albert Dupontel|Bouli Lanners|Suzanne Clément|Michael Lonsdale|David Murgia|Aurore Broutin|Philippe Rebbot|Serge Riaboukine|Lionel Abelanski|Virgile Bramly|Max von Sydow|Fabrice Adde|Pascale Wouters|Sybille Blouin|Loredana Flori|Tijmen Govaerts|Salomé Dewaels|Olivier Sallé|Renaud Rutten|Didier Toupy|Dominique Bettenfeld|André Pasquasy
keywords: stolen cell phone|bounty hunter|cell phone|title based on the bible|stigmata
title: Les premiers les derniers
